children.name: less than 2 km
children.information: A small tour, best paired with the shortest time range option

children.name: 2 to 5 km
children.information: A medium tour, best paired with the medium time range option

children.name: 5 to 10 km
children.information: A big tour, best paired with the longest time range option

children.name: by personal car
children.information: Having a personal vehicle might result in getting locations from farther away but also better rated

children.name: by public transport
children.information: More locations close to a public transport station will be put on the tour

children.name: by bycicle
children.information: A short distance will play a much more important role in selecting locations
